node.statement: SIGN CALCULATION: By the sign homomorphism property, sign(sigma tau) = sign(sigma) * sign(tau). Each transposition has sign -1. Therefore: sign((a_1 a_2 ... a_l)) = sign((a_1 a_l)) * sign((a_1 a_{l-1})) * ... * sign((a_1 a_2)) = (-1) * (-1) * ... * (-1) [l-1 times] = (-1)^{l-1}. QED.
